crime_fact:
Crime Facts
[Basic Facts]
The telephone financial fraud organization operates call centers overseas, including in China, and commits the so-called voice phishing fraud by impersonating financial institutions and others to swindle money from an unspecified number of people. For the execution of the crime, the organization operates in a cell-structured manner, dividing roles among 'lurers' who entice an unspecified number of victims via phone calls, 'account recruiters' who gather bank accounts to be used in the crime, 'withdrawers' and 'collectors' who withdraw cash deposited into these accounts or collect money from victims to deliver it, and 'transfer agents', with a 'mastermind' overseeing and directing the overall crime plan. Utilizing the fact that victims would unsuspectingly answer calls if the caller ID on their mobile phones shows a domestic number, even if the call is made from abroad via the internet, the organization operates a relay office that mediates communication by installing a VoIP Gateway (Voice Over IP Gateway, a so-called 'relay device' that mediates calls between multiple mobile phones) to change international or internet phone numbers to domestic mobile phone numbers.
The defendant, around the end of March 2022, accepted an offer from 'Z', a member of the telephone financial fraud organization whom he met at a construction site, stating, "I am starting a new business. If you install the equipment I send you in your vehicle and operate it from 9 AM to 6 PM, I will pay you a monthly allowance of 6 million won."
Accordingly, the defendant received a relay device, LTE router, high-capacity battery, and power converter (hereinafter referred to as 'relay device, etc.') via courier at his residence in Gwonseon-gu, Suwon-si, from an unidentified member of the telephone financial fraud organization introduced by 'Z' (WeChat conversation name 'AB'), and on around April 27, 2022, installed them in a Sportage vehicle rented from 'AC Co., Ltd.' located in Ansan-si. Following 'AB's instructions, to avoid detection by investigative agencies, he drove around areas such as Gangnam-gu, Seocho-gu, and Dongjak-gu in Seoul, relaying communications by altering the caller ID of phones used in telephone financial fraud.
[Specific Crime Facts]
1. Fraud
The defendant connected the internet to the relay device received from the unidentified member of the telephone financial fraud organization (WeChat conversation name 'AB') and changed the caller ID of the phones used by the organization to a domestic phone number (phone number omitted).
Around May 2, 2022, an unidentified member of the telephone financial fraud organization called victim AD using the number altered through the relay device installed by the defendant, impersonating an IBK Industrial Bank employee, and lied, "We will provide you with a debt consolidation loan." Another unidentified member, impersonating an AE Bank employee, lied again, saying, "You have been suspended from payment due to a violation of the Financial Transactions Act for applying for a debt consolidation loan with another financial institution, but you can lift the suspension by paying the original loan amount of 16 million won in cash."
However, in reality, the unidentified individuals were neither employees of IBK Industrial Bank nor AE Bank, and they had neither the intention nor the ability to provide a debt consolidation loan despite receiving money under the guise of a security deposit.
Nevertheless, the defendant conspired with the unidentified members of the telephone financial fraud organization to deceive the victim, leading the victim to hand over 12 million won in cash to a cash collector member of the telephone financial fraud organization on the street of Daemyeong-ro, Nam-gu, Daegu, around May 3, 2022, among other instances. From then until around June 29, 2022, through the relay device installed by the defendant, a total of 2,173,760,000 won was swindled from a total of 73 victims by calling them from domestic mobile phone numbers and impersonating financial institution employees, as listed in the attached crime summary table 1.
2. Violation of the Telecommunications Business Act
a. Mediating Others' Communications
No one shall mediate or provide others' communications using the telecommunication services provided by a telecommunications business operator.
At the time and place mentioned in paragraph 1, the defendant enabled communication between the SIM bank, which contained SIMs connected to domestic mobile phone numbers, and the relay device provided and installed by the unidentified member of the telephone financial fraud organization (WeChat conversation name 'AB'), allowing the unidentified members of the organization to communicate with an unspecified number of people using a total of 355 domestic mobile phone numbers, as listed in the attached crime summary table 2.
Thus, the defendant conspired with the unidentified members of the telephone financial fraud organization to mediate others' communications using the telecommunication services provided by a telecommunications business operator.
b. Operating an Unregistered Value-Added Telecommunications Business
Anyone who wishes to operate a telecommunications business must register with the Minister of Science and ICT in accordance with Presidential Decree, including financial and technical capabilities, user protection plans, and other business plans as prescribed.
At the time and place mentioned in paragraph 1, the defendant, in conspiracy with the unidentified members of the telephone financial fraud organization, operated a value-added telecommunications business without registering with the Minister of Science and ICT, by installing the relay device, etc., and connecting it to the internet, thereby enabling the organization's members to communicate with unspecified individuals in Korea by converting the calls to domestic mobile phone numbers, as listed in the attached crime summary table 2.

target_node.label: W_13
target_node.text: The defendant's involvement in the operation of relay devices for a telephone financial fraud organization was not merely a technical task, but played a core and essential role in the criminal activity, demonstrating a full awareness of the nature and purpose of the crime.

target_reason: Explanation: w00013 argues that the defendant's acceptance of risk for profit, despite recognizing the possibility of crime, signifies implied intent. However, this is a weak argument due to the lack of direct evidence or clear logical connection to the defendant's psychological state. To claim implied intent, specific evidence or logic demonstrating that the defendant was aware of the crime's outcome and its possibility is required. Yet, w00013 only emphasizes that the defendant's actions were essential to the crime's composition, without presenting direct evidence or logic that the defendant actually recognized the outcome of the crime and accepted its risk. Therefore, this argument merely assumes the defendant's psychological state and lacks a logical connection to prove implied intent for the crime.

nodes.label: MC_01
nodes.text: The defendant lacks intent as they were unaware of the specific roles or methods required for the voice phishing crime, and merely operated the equipment provided.

nodes.label: MC_01
nodes.text: The defendant played a significant role in the voice phishing organization and was fully aware of the criminal nature of the acts through the excessive compensation and the abnormal nature of the tasks.

nodes.label: C_01
nodes.text: The defendant was unaware of the specific execution method of the telephone financial fraud.

nodes.label: W_01
nodes.text: It can be seen that there is a lack of intent as the role performed by the defendant was limited to the installation and operation of technical equipment, and there was no knowledge of the overall plan or specific execution process of the fraud.

nodes.label: D_01
nodes.text: The defendant received a proposal around the end of March 2022 from 'Z' stating, "I am planning to start a new business. If you install the equipment I send you in your vehicle and operate it while carrying it around from 9 AM to 6 PM, I will pay you a monthly allowance of 6 million won in return." The defendant agreed to this proposal.

nodes.label: C_02
nodes.text: The defendant lacks criminal intent.

nodes.label: W_02
nodes.text: It can be confirmed that the defendant lacks intent, as they were not clearly aware of the existence of the telephone financial fraud organization or its criminal purpose, and merely performed a technical role in operating the equipment.

nodes.label: D_02
nodes.text: The defendant received a business proposal from 'Z' and, from an unidentified person (WeChat username 'AB'), received relay devices, LTE routers, high-capacity batteries, and power converters via courier, and operated the equipment while moving according to instructions.

nodes.label: C_03
nodes.text: The defendant was not aware of the overall structure of the crime or the roles of other members of the organization.

nodes.label: W_03
nodes.text: The fact that the defendant did not directly participate in obtaining information necessary for the execution of the crime, in collaboration with other members of the organization, or in the process of deceiving the victims, indicates that the defendant was not aware of the overall structure or operational methods of the criminal organization.

nodes.label: D_03
nodes.text: The defendant was unaware that the calls being made to the victims through the repeater he installed were impersonating employees of financial institutions, and merely performed the role of operating the equipment while driving in a specific area according to 'AB's instructions.

nodes.label: C_04
nodes.text: The defendant played an essential role in relaying communications, which was crucial for the voice phishing fraud.

nodes.label: W_04
nodes.text: By installing a repeater, the defendant enabled members of an unidentified voice phishing organization to communicate with victims by making calls to domestic phone numbers and impersonating financial institution employees. Thus, the defendant directly contributed to the execution of the crime.

nodes.label: D_04
nodes.text: Around May 2, 2022, the defendant, through a repeater installed at an unknown location, called the victim AD using the converted phone number (omitting phone number 1) and falsely claimed to be an employee of IBK Industrial Bank, stating, "I will provide you with a debt consolidation loan."

nodes.label: C_05
nodes.text: The defendant actively participated in the criminal act by receiving excessive compensation from voice phishing crimes.

nodes.label: W_05
nodes.text: The defendant's agreement to receive a monthly payment of 6 million won in return for operating a relay device, as proposed by the member of the voice phishing organization 'Z', is excessively high compared to the compensation for general work or services, suggesting that the defendant was aware of the seriousness of the criminal act.

nodes.label: D_05
nodes.text: In late March 2022, from an individual 'Z', who was known to be a member of a voice phishing organization met at a construction site, the proposal was received stating, "I am planning to start a new business. If you install the equipment I send you in your vehicle and operate it while carrying it around from 9 AM to 6 PM, I will pay you a monthly allowance of 6 million won." The fact that the offer was accepted is acknowledged.

nodes.label: C_06
nodes.text: The defendant conspired in the execution of the crime by acting in accordance with the instructions of the voice phishing organization to evade the tracking of investigative authorities.

nodes.label: W_06
nodes.text: The act of the defendant driving around areas such as Gangnam-gu, Seocho-gu, and Dongjak-gu in Seoul, relaying communications through a repeater as per instructions received from an unidentified person, clearly aims to evade tracking by investigative authorities. This indicates that the defendant acted in accordance with the instructions and plans of a criminal group as a member thereof.

nodes.label: D_06
nodes.text: On or around April 27, 2022, a Sportage vehicle rented from 'AC Corporation', a car rental company located in Ansan City, was equipped with a relay device and connected to the internet network, enabling the relay device to connect with a SIM bank located overseas. Following the instructions of 'AB', the vehicle was driven around areas such as Gangnam-gu, Seocho-gu, and Dongjak-gu in Seoul to evade tracking by investigative authorities. The vehicle was used to commit telephone financial fraud by relaying communications in a manner that altered the originating phone numbers.

nodes.label: C_07
nodes.text: The fact that the defendant received excessive allowances does not immediately imply that they were aware of the criminal act.

nodes.label: W_07
nodes.text:
ENGLISH OUTPUT 
A high amount of allowance does not directly prove the awareness of criminal activity, and there is a possibility that the defendant was not clearly aware of the specific method or purpose of the crime.

nodes.label: D_07
nodes.text: "In late March 2022, from an acquaintance made at a construction site, a member of a voice phishing organization known as 'Z', I received a proposal stating, 'I am planning to start a new business. If you install the equipment I send you in your vehicle and operate it while carrying it around from 9 AM to 6 PM, I will pay you a monthly allowance of 6 million won in return.' I agreed to this proposal."

nodes.label: C_08
nodes.text: The defendant did not directly participate in the specific activities of the voice phishing organization.

nodes.label: W_08
nodes.text: The defendant's role was limited to the operation of technical equipment, which is distant from the actual execution of the crime.

nodes.label: D_08
nodes.text: "The defendant, at that time, received delivery at their residence in AA, Gwonseon-gu, Suwon-si, of relay devices, LTE routers, high-capacity batteries, and power converters (hereinafter referred to as 'relay devices, etc.') from an unidentified individual (WeChat conversation name 'AB'), who was a member of a telephone financial fraud organization introduced by 'Z', via courier. Around April 27, 2022, the defendant installed these relay devices, etc., in a Sportage vehicle rented from 'AC Corporation', a car rental company located in Ansan-si, and connected the relay devices to the internet network so that they could be linked with a SIM bank located overseas. Following 'AB's instructions, the defendant drove around areas such as Gangnam-gu, Seocho-gu, and Dongjak-gu in Seoul to relay communications by altering the caller ID of phones used in the telephone financial fraud, thereby evading detection by investigative authorities."

nodes.label: C_09
nodes.text: The defendant was unaware of the overall plan or structure of the voice phishing crime.

nodes.label: W_09
nodes.text: The fact that the defendant carried out their duties with only limited information suggests that they were unaware of the overall criminal structure or plan.

nodes.label: D_09
nodes.text: "The defendant, around the end of March 2022, received a proposal from 'Z,' a member of a voice phishing gang whom he met at a construction site, stating, 'I am planning to start a new business. If you install the equipment I send you in your vehicle and operate it while carrying it around from 9 AM to 6 PM, I will pay you a monthly allowance of 6 million won.' The defendant agreed to this proposal." and "Around that time, at the defendant's residence in AA, Gwonseon-gu, Suwon-si, the defendant received via courier, from a person of unknown name (WeChat conversation name 'AB') introduced by 'Z,' a member of the voice phishing gang, equipment including a repeater, LTE router, high-capacity battery, and power converter (hereinafter referred to as 'the repeater, etc.')."

nodes.label: C_10
nodes.text: The defendant played a key role in the telephone financial fraud organization and fully understood the overall structure and purpose of the crime through this.

nodes.label: W_10
nodes.text: Considering that the repeater installed and operated by the defendant was directly used in the telephone financial fraud, it can be seen that the defendant was fully aware of the specific execution method and purpose of the crime.

nodes.label: D_10
nodes.text:
ENGLISH OUTPUT 
The defendant, around the end of March 2022, was offered to operate a repeater by 'Z', and agreed to install and operate it in exchange for a monthly allowance of 6 million won.

nodes.label: C_11
nodes.text: The defendant installed repeaters to carry out voice phishing crimes and, following the instructions of the criminal organization members, moved around specific areas performing roles essential to the criminal activity.

nodes.label: W_11
nodes.text: The act of receiving instructions related to the installation and operation of a repeater and carrying them out demonstrates that the defendant acted in accordance with the directives of a criminal organization and, through this, played a role as a member of the criminal organization.

nodes.label: D_11
nodes.text: Following the instructions of 'Z', the defendant installed a relay device and then drove around areas such as Gangnam-gu, Seocho-gu, and Dongjak-gu in Seoul, relaying communications by altering the caller ID of phones used in telephone financial fraud.

nodes.label: C_12
nodes.text: The defendant was deeply involved in telephone financial fraud, and the excessive compensation received was in return for such criminal activities.

nodes.label: W_12
nodes.text: The fact that the defendant agreed to receive excessive compensation directly linked to the proceeds of crime suggests that the defendant was aware of the substance of the crime and received compensation for it.

nodes.label: D_12
nodes.text: The defendant agreed to receive a monthly allowance of 6 million won from the voice phishing organization, which indicates that the defendant played a significant role in the commission of the voice phishing crime.

nodes.label: C_13
nodes.text: The defendant is sufficiently recognized to have intentionally contributed essential and direct support to the crime by playing a significant role in the voice phishing organization.

nodes.label: W_13
nodes.text: The defendant's involvement in the operation of relay devices for a telephone financial fraud organization was not merely a technical task, but played a core and essential role in the criminal activity, demonstrating a full awareness of the nature and purpose of the crime.

nodes.label: D_13
nodes.text: The defendant received an offer from a member of a telephone financial fraud organization, 'Z', and subsequently received relays and other items from an unidentified person (WeChat ID 'AB'), and relayed communications by altering the caller ID of phones used in telephone financial fraud crimes. This task is one of the core components of voice phishing fraud crimes.

nodes.label: C_14
nodes.text: The excessive remuneration received by the defendant is exceptionally high compared to the usual compensation for work or business, serving as circumstantial evidence that the defendant was aware of their involvement in criminal activities.

nodes.label: W_14
nodes.text: The intent behind the criminal act can be inferred from the size and abnormality of the compensation received by the defendant, and excessive remuneration indicates that the defendant was aware of the illegal nature and risks of the work performed.

nodes.label: D_14
nodes.text: The defendant agreed to receive a monthly allowance of 6 million won from 'Z' for operating a relay station, which is significantly higher than the amount for legal and normal business or work.

nodes.label: C_15
nodes.text: The operation of the relay devices carried out by the defendant constitutes a core methodology of voice phishing crimes, which involves making calls to the victims using domestic mobile phone numbers and impersonating employees of financial institutions. Therefore, the defendant was fully aware of the nature of the crime.

nodes.label: W_15
nodes.text: In telephone financial fraud crimes, using a relay device to alter the caller ID is one of the key methods that make victims trust the call by recognizing the caller ID as a domestic number. By being involved in such operations, the defendant can be seen as having recognized the nature of the crime and contributed to it.

nodes.label: D_15
nodes.text: The defendant connected the internet to a relay device received from an unidentified person (WeChat username 'AB'), and converted the caller ID of phones used by members of an unidentified voice phishing organization into domestic phone numbers. Through this, they approached the victims by impersonating employees of financial institutions.

nodes.label: C_16
nodes.text: The defendant, not having a clear understanding of the overall structure or purpose of the voice phishing crime, proves a lack of intent.

nodes.label: W_16
nodes.text: The intent of a crime is determined based on whether the defendant was aware of the specific purpose and method of the crime, and merely operating equipment alone is not sufficient to prove intent.

nodes.label: D_16
nodes.text: The defendant only received a proposal from 'Z' stating, "I am planning to start a new business. If you install the equipment I send you in your vehicle and operate it while carrying it around from 9 AM to 6 PM, I will pay you a monthly allowance of 6 million won," without any mention of the specific purpose or method of the voice phishing crime.

nodes.label: C_17
nodes.text: The compensation received by the defendant does not indicate the intentionality of the criminal act, and it was a situation that could be mistaken for a normal business consideration.

nodes.label: W_17
nodes.text: The determination of intent should be made by comprehensively considering the nature of the work performed by the defendant and the appropriateness of the compensation for it. Even if the amount the defendant claims to have received is excessive, that alone cannot be seen as having a clear awareness of the criminal act.

nodes.label: D_17
nodes.text: The defendant agreed to receive a monthly allowance of 6 million won for the operation of the relay equipment, which sufficiently demonstrates that there was ample room for misunderstanding the offer received by the defendant as a legitimate business proposal.

nodes.label: C_18
nodes.text: The defendant, as a member of a criminal organization, lacked specific knowledge of their role or the methods of the crime, and therefore cannot be considered a conspirator.

nodes.label: W_18
nodes.text: The recognition of criminal conspiracy depends on whether the defendant was fully aware of the specific plans or methods of execution of the crime, and mere performance of duties cannot easily be taken as evidence of conspiracy.

nodes.label: D_18
nodes.text: The defendant only performed the task of connecting the internet to the relay device received from 'Z', and was not directly involved in the specific execution methods of the voice phishing crime or in deceiving the victims.
